version_description:
- Performance fixes for older devices
- Some graphical tweaks throughout
- Various bug fixes
- Announcement of Mini Motor Racing WRT (free)

To celebrate five years of Mini Motor Racing excellence, we're bringing Mini Motor Racing into the future with a massive overhaul. Retina graphics, multiplayer matchmaking services & iMessage stickers are just some of the features we'll be adding, along with a host of updated tracks, cars, and game modes -- a complete remastering. And to show our gratitude to the fans who made the game such a success, we're making the update free!

- All new Championship
- New tracks
- New cars
- Revitalised multiplayer with new match making servers and facebook support
- Full remastered textures, lighting and effects throughout
- New iMessage stickers
- Added support for iPad
